rComments: What an amazing professor! She has amazing discussions in her classes and gives honest feedback on papers as well as in office hours. She helped me so much in my time at UCSC and I learned a huge amount from her classes!

Absolutely ridiculous. She is very boring, for one, and also is very biased and closed minded in her thinking. Discusses political topics and her own political opinions that are no where near relevant to the class. Rude, and does not answer questions extensively. Speaks in fancy words and yet does not make sense at all. Horrible teacher. Stay away.

Felicity is an amazing teacher. I do agree with people that she does get a little lost in her lecturing at times, but she is really passionate about fem. studies, and its clear that she cares for her students and education. Her classes are dense, but she is always more than helpful if you ask for some advice. Im glad to have been one of her student

She is a really nice lady. Her teaching style is very confusing because she doesn't have a very linear thinking path. The questions she asks are very dense. The material is very interesting but the readings can be quite long.

Felicity is very nice, but she is not the best professor for seminars. She asked a lot of huge questions that seemed to answer themselves most of the time, so classes were full of awkward silences. She was also pretty disorganized.

Worse prof. ever! She is horribly boring and fails to solicit participation of students. Completely unclear in what she wants from both papers and in class discussion. rarely lectures-relies on class participation whether or not it works.reading was interesting but dis. on it was useless.Arbitrarily grades participation and presentations STAY AWAY!

I enjoyed the class and when she was on the lectures were interesting and provactive. If ur a FMST major the class may be boring considering we've read almost all of the essays already. Also it was a transnational class and I noticed we read very few essays outside of Latin America/Latinas.
Felicity is super nice, but super boring. I wish she was a better lecturer because the material is amazing.
